name: GrowthBook
headline: Open source feature flagging and A/B testing
description:
GrowthBook is an open source platform to help companies make data-driven product decisions with feature flags and A/B tests.  

Existing SaaS solutions like LaunchDarkly require a company to send all of their data to them. This results in high costs, data compliance issues, and vendor lock-in.  As a result, many companies end up building their own platforms in-house, which can take thousands of hours of work and lots of headaches.  To solve this, GrowthBook uses a company's existing data infrastructure and business metrics.

We believe feature flags and experimentation are the right way to build products at scale and that they will become a standard part of the development process.  GrowthBook is well positioned to be a leader in this growing market.

founders.name: Graham McNicoll, Founder
founders.description: Graham is the Co-founder and CEO of GrowthBook. Previously he was the CTO of Education.com for 6 years. He helped grow Education.com into one of the largest Ed-tech platforms, helping millions with access to quality educational material, and led to a successful exit in 2019. Graham is a three times startup founder, including starting an international non-profit to increase access to communication in the developing world, particularly sub Saharan Africa. He has a degree in Physics from CMU.

founders.name: Jeremy Dorn, Founder
founders.description: Jeremy is the Co-founder and CTO of GrowthBook.  Prior to that, he was Chief Architect at Education.com where he scaled the web application to over 1 billion requests per month. Jeremy is also heavily involved in the open source community and speaks at conferences on the importance of building great developer experiences.

# Streamline Experimentation
The #1 Open-Source Feature Flag & Experimentation Platform
[Get Started](https://www.growthbook.io/</get-started>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/673cfbdea71ee81d97be64f2_grwothbook-hero-image.png)
## Trusted by thousands of organizations
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/66aab564d6d0f060f1430d9a_dropbox-logo-white.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/670d890794bdc4d2cc5e4d53_logo-sony.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/670d885901bbc0b5b9f06d7b_logo-upstart.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/65e569cc95197313d5f1ae78_Logo_LosAngelesTimes%402x.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/65e56ee813b6ea3a5561dc65_Logo_Opera%402x.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/670d87279e1d8b79c87ed026_logos-ka.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/67574c10670855fecc911eda_Pepsi-logo-white-hor2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/675741360edfde02ca0ed84d_Character.ai_logo_new.png)
## Easily measure the success of your products while minimizing engineering and data resources.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c386dd7e1d0840076a2844/67770ae6dc40bf5adee07b3f_20250102T0953-c76af13f-61d0-41c6-9ed3-3e584843e988.jpeg)
Theo
t3.gg
GrowthBook is OSS and much better DX, I'm pretty done w/ Darkly at this point
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c386dd7e1d0840076a2844/67770ae66e31868c4af56480_20250102T0953-46d072e7-86c7-4eef-91a0-e07ca290a9bf.jpeg)
Merritt Aho
Breeze Airways
GrowthBook helped us create millions of dollars' worth of e-commerce magic. Itâ€™s been instrumental in scaling our experimentation efforts and driving better decisions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c386dd7e1d0840076a2844/67770ae6569dff341793df2c_20250102T0953-f9885952-5d04-441c-9404-1ca5d4efa382.png)
John Resig
Khan Academy
GrowthBook is so good. One of the only options that's actually able to load fast, be cacheable, support storing data off-site, and handle synchronous rendering on the client.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c386dd7e1d0840076a2844/67770ae679e9a142aeeecfdf_20250102T0953-162abda9-0635-46bd-872c-9a3466b0bcb3.jpeg)
Pat McGee
Principal Engineer, GoodDog
GrowthBook checked all my boxes. The fact that it just queries our data warehouse means we can set up much more sophisticated metrics that are based on tables our data team has built with DBT instead of being tied to just querying raw event data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c386dd7e1d0840076a2844/67770ae5f770c325ac01b7ba_20250102T0953-e18494e8-217c-40a5-85b7-ccf3e7b0a153.jpeg)
Roger Pedroso
Head of Software Engineering, Newfold
Our team is really enjoying GrowthBook. We migrated all the feature toggles from Optimizely and everything is working fine.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c386dd7e1d0840076a2844/67770ae54a3cd9dad5ee1cbb_20250102T0953-e37e2567-ff0b-4e2f-8ac8-598b6151c40a.jpeg)
Alexander Harmsen
CEO & Founder, Global Predictions
We've been using the product over the last month to run a few dozen tests and have already increased our overall funnel conversion by about 54%!
## Feature Flags & Experiments Together
Seamless integration makes it easy to release, target and measure the impact of product changes from a single platform.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/65ce74b4f8db4306c45fb3c1_GB-Website-Illustration-Home-Features-Gradient.png)
### Feature Flagging
Launch with confidence. Maintain an uncluttered code base as you scale.
[Explore Feature Flagging](https://www.growthbook.io/</products/feature-flagging>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/65ce74b54db0f70c52af1498_GB-Website-Illustration-Home-Experiments-Gradient.png)
### A/B Testing
Manage experiments end-to-end for continuous product improvements.
[Explore Experiments](https://www.growthbook.io/</products/experiments>)
## We work with your data
GrowthBook is warehouse native, and works with your data where it already lives, allowing you to maintain control, increase privacy and security, and avoid vendor lock-in. We're integrated with all major SQL data sources, plus tools like Mixpanel and Google Analytics
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/675b59341f8dae32ac3655b2_modern-data-stack-2-min.png)
## ... and natively support most event trackers
We have built in support for 15 common sources of data, including Google Analytics, Segment, RudderStack, Amplitude, Snowplow and more. Have a custom event tracker or use one not listed? Don't worry - data sources are fully customizable if you have unique data needs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/675b599b528547d160ae4508_data-event-trackers-min.png)
### GrowthBook serves 100 billion+ feature flag lookups per day
Open Source
#### Self-host for Ultimate Control and Security
We build GrowthBook in the open on GitHub and release daily. GrowthBook is certified SOC II and GDPR compliant.
[Get Started ](https://www.growthbook.io/</get-started>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/65eb4bb167c59e00aad86123_GB_Illustration_Home_Cloud%402x.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/66ecf651d6ffcf97e58b1b63_solutions-ai-results.png)
Data science
#### Enterprise Statistics
GrowthBook's statistics package supports the most advanced techniques from letting you pick your engine (Bayesian, Frequentists, and Sequential) to CUPED to run experiments faster, to multiple metric corrections (Benjamini-Hochberg, Bonferroni) and data quality checks (SRM, etc).
[Get Started ](https://www.growthbook.io/</get-started>)
Performance
#### Designed for Speed & Optimal User Experience
Our industry-leading lightweight SDKs with local real-time evaluation means superfast load times. Combine with our highly-customizable cacheing for uptime and resiliency.
[Get Started ](https://www.growthbook.io/</get-started>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/65eeac45ca00890dd4211af9_SDK%20Connections%20Collection%402x.png)
## Built for Teams
Promote a culture of experimentation across your organization.
[Engineering](https://www.growthbook.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Data Science](https://www.growthbook.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Product Management](https://www.growthbook.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Marketing](https://www.growthbook.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/65e7bcfda1d7a25ef412ea78_GB%20Illustration%20Home%20-%20SDK%20size%402x.png)
### Industry-leading Lightweight SDKs
Our JS SDK is 9kâ€”less than half the size of our closest competitors. Dramatically reduce load times with our open source SDKs for JavaScript, Python, Ruby, PHP. Use our intuitive API for other languages.
[View All SDKs ](https://www.growthbook.io/<https:/docs.growthbook.io/lib/>)[View API Docs ](https://www.growthbook.io/<https:/docs.growthbook.io/app/api>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/65e7be9195e4314f8d85fb3a_GB%20Illustration%20Home%20Data%20Science%20No%20Shadow%402x.png)
### Enterprise-class Experimentation
Our robust Bayesian and Frequentist statistic engines, along with our configurable metric library, means you can customize GrowthBook to exactly match your needs.
[View Docs ](https://www.growthbook.io/<https:/docs.growthbook.io/app/experiment-results>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/65e7b9031ef6e65923b5d50a_GB%20Illustration%20Product%20Management%20Enable%20Feature%402x.png)
### Independently Deploy New Experiments
Product managers can deploy new features, target roll outs, and deploy new A/B tests all from our easy-to-use platform.
[Get Started](https://www.growthbook.io/</get-started>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/65e7c038693b6ba7084673a0_GB_Illustration_VisualEditor%402x.png)
### Manage No-code Website Updates
Our Visual Editor allows you to run A/B tests on your website without requiring engineering support or code changes.
[Visual Editor Details](https://www.growthbook.io/<https:/docs.growthbook.io/app/visual>)
## Join Our Community
Discuss the future of product experimentation or chat with our team
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/65b9b6a79e2e5cc8a67f02d0_Slack_Technologies_Logo%201.png)
4,500 members and growing
### Get answers quickly on GrowthBook Slack
Ask questions, give feedback, and learn from others who are actively pursuing a culture of experimentation.
[Join GrowthBook Slack](https://www.growthbook.io/<https:/join.slack.com/t/growthbookusers/shared_invite/zt-2xw8fu279-Y~hwnfCEf7WrEI9qScHURQ/?ref=community-page>)
## Ready to get started?
Explore GrowthBook on your own terms. Create your free account, or contact us for a tailored demo, with the option to discuss your use case.
[Create Free Account](https://www.growthbook.io/</get-started>)[Schedule Demo ](https://www.growthbook.io/<https:/www.growthbook.io/demo>)
### Ready to get started?
Seat-based pricing for teams of all sizes.
[Pricing Details ](https://www.growthbook.io/</pricing>)
### Start your Integration
Get set up in minutes on GrowthBook Cloud or self-hosted.
[Documentation ](https://www.growthbook.io/<https:/docs.growthbook.io/>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/65b7f3298189c83ce56fd784_GB-Logo-White%201.svg)](https://www.growthbook.io/</>)
GrowthBook is an open-source feature flagging and experimentation platform that helps you release code better and measure the impact with your own data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/65e8f1920934058fd9197ebc_SOC2_logo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b7ac22fd61413f7db83b81/65e8f1a3f02b91b3345913f8_GDPR_Logo.png)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: GrowthBook**

Founded in 2020 and hailing from Y Combinatorâ€™s Batch W22, GrowthBook is carving out its niche as an open-source feature flagging and A/B testing platform. Located in Palo Alto, California, and staffed with a team of 21, it sets itself apart from traditional SaaS giants like LaunchDarkly by allowing organizations to leverage their existing data infrastructures. This approach not only reduces costs associated with data transfer but also alleviates compliance issues and mitigates the vendor lock-in that tends to haunt many companies.

### Mission and Vision
At its core, GrowthBook believes that integrating feature flags and experimentation into the product development lifecycle is crucial for scaling effectively. The company aims to democratize experimentation by providing tools that enable businesses to make data-driven decisions without the headaches of heavy data transfers or extensive in-house builds.

### Products and Solutions
GrowthBook's main offerings include:

1. **Feature Flagging**: This feature allows teams to launch new code with confidence while keeping their codebase clean and manageable.
2. **A/B Testing**: With tools to seamlessly manage experiments from start to finish, teams can continuously refine product features based on real user interactions.

The platform is specifically tailored for various industries, offering dedicated solutions for fintech, health tech, ed-tech, and AI, making it versatile for users across sectors.

### Key Features
- **Data Native**: GrowthBook integrates directly with existing data sources, allowing organizations to maintain control and compliance without extra costs tied to transferring data to third-party platforms.
- **Open Source**: Being open-source, GrowthBook promotes transparency and flexibility, enabling developers to customize their implementations per unique needs.
- **Community Support**: GrowthBook has fostered a burgeoning community with over 4,500 members, encouraging collaboration and sharing of best practices.

### Testimonials and Adoption
GrowthBook has gained traction with major organizations, simplifying the complexities surrounding experimentation and feature releases. Customer testimonials highlight the platform's speed, ease of integration, and significant impact on conversion rates and decision-making processes.

### Leadership
Led by Nicolas Dessaigne as Group Partner, GrowthBook stands poised to dominate the feature flagging and testing market, presenting itself as an attractive alternative for teams looking to innovate efficiently.

In essence, GrowthBook isnâ€™t just a tool; itâ€™s a philosophy aimed at transforming how companies experiment and grow, all while ensuring they retain control over their data. If youâ€™re intrigued by the potential of open-source experimentation, check out [GrowthBook](https://www.growthbook.io) to learn how it can fit within your organization.

Hereâ€™s the crux: at GrowthBook, they believe it's not just about releasing featuresâ€”it's about empowering teams to experiment and evolve seamlessly.
